participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Caring and resilient, with a humorous side that helps him cope.
participant_1.background: I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. What's up, I am a 46-year-old single dad with a kid. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Excited and optimistic, with a practical approach to life.
participant_2.background: I just bought my first home. I already have a child. I am an omnivore. I am expecting twins in two months.

content.text: i just bought my first home and would be glad to see you there
cause i already have a children in the basement
that might sounds rough but i am an omnivore
i am expecting twins in two months i ordered on ebay with cashback
